name: Pseudo Happiness
description:
Happiness is all the same
What is different is the embodiment
And the way to achieve it

Some are happy because they are rich
Some are happy because they are loved
Someone is happy because of that
Some are happy because they are proud
Some are happy because of recognition
Some are happy because of power
Etc

Everything tastes the same, it's just how to present that feeling in many ways & many forms

It's just mind perception
It's all a choice of one's own consciousness
If pure consciousness has arisen then we will not use it in form

Happiness can be experienced at any time, experience, with anything, because you are aware that happiness is about perception/choice. Not an obtainable material

Material achievement and satisfaction are individualistic because everyone has a different size
